content.raw:
A couple of issues with the firehose as of trunk today:

1) I think the physical behaviour is a big issue. It moves/vibrates/slides at a significant rate. The handle seems to typically turn up gradually over time. The second joint on the hose vibrates to the left side of the table and then falls off.
Thus its possible that the hose could have passively fallen off the table before a team can walk there.
This makes the problem difficult unintentionally variable and its not clear that its physically realistic.
I could think of a number of fixes for this - but can you ensure that the hose will be on the table?

2) The texture on the blue handle is very very weak. Stereo Block Matching gives almost no returns. All the other objects (valve, hose, drill, standpipe and car parts) were fine in this regard. Could you increase the texture on it?
